definitions.title: n.[f.]
definitions.body: branch, twig, shoot—abs. ´[[ז]] Nu 13:23, ´[[הַזּ]] Ez Eze 8:17, Eze 15:2; cstr. [[זְמׂרַת]] Is 17:10; sf. [[זְמׂרֵיהֶם]] Na 2:3; —branch of grape-vine Nu 13:23 (JE), Ez Eze 15:2; branch, twig (Co Reissigbündel) used in idolatrous worship [[אֶל־אַפָּם]] ´[[הַזּ]] Ez Eze 8:17 (v. Sm and most), but custom obscure (v. Da), and txt. dub.; [[זְמׂרַת זׇר]] (cf. Ew:§ 287 b) Is 17:10 twigs of a strange one (i.e. of a strange god) fig. of idolatrous cults adopted by Isr.; ´[[ז]] pl. in fig. of Israelites Na 2:3.
